greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Twisted variant of A276086.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2310
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: (PARI) A328627(n) = { my(m=1, p=2, d=0); while(n, d = lift(Mod(n,p)/(d+1)); m *= (p^d); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (m); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 25 2019
